name: Andora
overview: This is a preview of the adventure game ANDORA: Forest Prison made by Eric Cubizolle and Sylvain Martinez. In the final version there will be 5 areas: the forest, the village, the temple, the two others. The story is inspired by several fantastic events. The action takes place as you must discover what is at the heart of such a forest where one cannot escape. It has 64 colors. 188 wanderers per level... or 588 screens in total, 1 to 5 different languages. Ability to speak with the characters.
